description: Unique alphanumeric code identifying a specific system permission or action used by access control and application logic.
Functional area or module grouping the permission, used to organize and filter security rights.
Human-readable description of what the permission allows or restricts.
Numeric display order for the permission in menus or security configuration; values determine list position.
Y/N flag indicating whether the permission is applicable or enforced in the current environment.
Numeric identifier for the permission used for security mapping and ordering; often corresponds to the display sequence.
Cross-reference code mapping the permission to a legacy or external systemâ€™s right; used for integrations or migrations; may be unavailable for some rights.
